title: Opera Omnia Tracker
description: Opera Omnia Tracker is an ongoing personal project I created to track progress in the game, Dissidia Final Fantasy: Opera Omnia.
Originally a Nuxt.js app, it has recently had a complete rewrite in React, and has new features being added regularly.
The main API for the back-end is created by the Hasura GraphQL Engine, using custom PostgresSQL functions to create additional GraphQL fields.

title: Arabella's Circus
description: Arabella's Circus is a childrens toy and costume shop, selling pieces inspired by the 19th century circuses, hosted on Big Cartel.
The website is a custom theme I created for the client in Shopify's Liquid templating language, with custom JavaScript to work with Big Cartel's JavaScript API in order to make the shop interactive.

title: Junk Street
description: Junk Street Vegan Eats are a popup serving the south east of the UK. I'm a huge fan of their burgers so being asked to work on this for them was awesome.
I used GatsbyJS to create the website, with Netlify CMS being used to keep the menu and upcoming events up to date.
